API¶

string_ops¶

package_creation_tutorial.string_ops.capitalize_words(s: str) → str¶

Capitalize the first letter of each word in the given string.

Paramètres:

s (str) – The input string to capitalize.

Renvoie:

A new string with each word capitalized.

Type renvoyé:

str

package_creation_tutorial.string_ops.count_vowels(s: str) → int¶

Count the number of vowels in the given string. Args: s (str): The input string to count vowels from. Returns: int: The number of vowels in the string.

package_creation_tutorial.string_ops.reverse_string(s: str) → str¶

Reverse the given string. Args: s (str): The input string to be reversed. Returns: str: The reversed string.

bilelproject
